artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Tsujiya Yasubei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Characters\' names aside the figures; right: {Inuzuka Shino} | left: {Inukai Genpachi}
markings: censor seals: {Hama} | {Magome} | publisher\'s seal: {Tsujiyasu} | [unknown carver\'s seal]: {Shōjirō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play "Satomi hakkenden" 里見八犬伝 (Satomi and the Legend of the Eight Dog Warriors), performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1852, 1st month.
title: Actors Bandō Shūka I as Inuzuka Shino (T) and Seki Sanjūrō III as Inukai Genpachi (B)
